18#include <string>
19
20namespace ZXing {
21
22enum class CharacterSet;
23
24class TextEncoder
25{
26 static void GetBytes(const std::wstring& str, CharacterSet charset, std::string& bytes);
27public:
28 static std::string FromUnicode(const std::wstring& str, CharacterSet charset) {
29 std::string r;
30 GetBytes(str, charset, r);
31 return r;
32 }
33};
34
35} // ZXing
